snippet.title: BAM - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
BAM is an exhilarating multiplayer battle game in mixed reality (MR). Place your tabletop arena anywhere you want, scale it, rotate it, and puppeteer your miniature robot to victory in a jetpack-fueled boxing match. Seize the crown, lose the bomb, or punch your opponents out of the field. Play BAM online or co-located with friends as the ultimate party game. Easy-to-master controls and stunning visuals redefine MR gaming, making BAM a must-play experience for all ages.

★ WISHLIST BAM ★ on Meta Quest: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/6480518325327644/

Visit our website: http://bamyoursocksoff.com

#BAMYOURSOCKSOFF
